attributes.action: reduce the duty on tobacco goods in line with other EU countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that we can travel to the European mainland and buy tobacco goods at a fraction of the cost in the UK, eg 50 gram packet tobacco in the UK costs nearly £12 but in Belgium it costs £4.

This would also negate the need for Customs officers trying to stop smuggling

This would not only bring money in to the UK economy but would mean that it would make it less attractive for criminals as well.
